title: Return to Normal-ish - Post-Lockdown Violence in the U.S. | Nick Kolcheff & Anthony Ramos
itunes:title: Return to Normal-ish - Post-Lockdown Violence in the U.S. | Nick Kolcheff & Anthony Ramos
description:
Violence spikes as Americans emerge from lockdown, gamer Nick Kolcheff talks about FaZe Clan and esports, and actor and singer Anthony Ramos discusses "In the Heights" and "Love and Lies."

Donate at dailyshow.com/BraveSpaceAlliance to help provide lifesaving resources like support groups, HIV prevention options, and housing and food services for Chicago's LGBTQ+ community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
